Rabies Vaccination.desc:
Summit County Public Health in cooperation with Pet Guards, Inc. is offering low-cost Rabies Vaccination Clinics for your dogs and cats. Cost is $8 per animal.

Saturday, June 6, 2015

Yard Sales.desc:
The 4th Annual City Wide Yard Sale will be June 11, 12, 13, & 14. Any residence in the City can participate, just place a balloon at the end of the street. A 'Yard Sale Permit' is NOT needed for these days only.

Sponsored by:
Craig Megyes, 4th Ward Councilman
Questions:
330-745-4577 or 330-753-4958
Yard Sales.clss: btn col-xs-12 col-sm-3 col-md-3 col-lg-3 btn-pride

Bulk Drop-off.desc:
Residents of the City of Barberton will have the opportunity to drop off bulk items and yard waste for FREE during the summer months.

More Details
